results.title: Simvastatin attenuates ventilator-induced lung injury in mice
results.text_hl: Healthy volunteers subjected to lipopolysacharide (LPS) inhalation developed @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@lung inflammation@@@, which was attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment.

results.title: Simvastatin decreases incidence of decompression sickness in rats.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ pretreatment abolished increases in systemic and @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@pulmonary inflammation@@@ by reducing @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@tumor necrosis factor-alpha@@@ levels in blood plasma and lung tissue.

results.title: NO-releasing xanthine KMUP-1 bonded by simvastatin attenuates bleomycin-induced lung inflammation and delayed fibrosis.
results.text_hl: This study is aimed to determine whether NO-releasing KMUP-1 inhibits @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@PI@@@ and @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D011658 @@@PF@@@, and if so, the benefits of KMUP-1S resulted from @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@)-bonding to KMUP-1.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates neutrophil recruitment in one-lung ventilation model in rats.
results.text_hl: Our findings suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may be of therapeutic value in OLV-induced @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@pulmonary inflammation@@@ deserving clinical investigations.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin, an established lipid-lowering drug, on pulmonary Chlamydia pneumoniae infection in mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ decreased viable chlamydial counts and increased @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cell infiltrates in the lung tissue, suggesting that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment had both antichlamydial and immunomodulatory effects during an acute @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@C. pneumoniae infection@@@.
